description:
Multifunctional and practical, you can wear the river shorts during all your activities on and even in the river this summer. Thanks to its durable, quick-drying fabric made of 100% recycled nylon, the lining with integrated mesh and the elastic waistband with belt make the garment comfortable, soft and flexible.

The Men's River Shorts are also part of our newest sun protection collection. UPF 50+ tested and certified, these shorts will keep you safe from UV rays, so you can do what you love for as long as possible.

This summer garment is a must-have for all your canoe-camping weekends. Easily compressible, this is the item you won't want to forget.
name: Hooke River Shorts - Mens
